description: This file defines a Todo interface, a TodoFilter type, and a Todos class that manages a list of Todo items with observable behavior and URL hash-based filtering.

classes.name: Todos
classes.description: A mutable, observable container for a todo list that supports filtering, adding, updating, deleting, toggling, and event firing.

methods.name: connect
methods.description: Adds a hashchange event listener to update the filter based on URL hash.

methods.name: filtered
methods.description: Returns the filtered list of todos based on current filter state.

methods.name: add
methods.description: Adds a new todo with a generated id.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Updates a todo's properties by id.

methods.name: toggle
methods.description: Toggles the completed state of a todo by id.

methods.name: toggleAll
methods.description: Toggles all todos' completed state based on current state.

methods.name: filter
methods.description: Setter for current filter, triggers change event.
